featured.text: At the end of the fifth week, the boys came back again and knocked at the old man’s house, waiting for their 38 .

definition.zh_def: 敲擊，通常是用手或物體輕輕地打擊某物以發出聲音。
definition.en_def: To strike a surface or object sharply to create a sound.
definition.example: She decided to knock on the door before entering.
